Most full-time gigs pay every couple of weeks or even once a month. If you wish you had something that paid more often (or just need a little influx of cash between paydays), consider starting a side hustle in your spare time.

Side hustles don’t require a specific schedule, and you determine what you want to do and your earning potential.

Check out my roundup of the best side hustles that offer same day pay to help you reach your financial goals.

Top 20 Side Hustles that Pay Daily

1. Make Deliveries with DoorDash

DoorDash is a popular side hustle that pays daily. With DoorDash, you set your own schedule and choose the deliveries you want to make. You’ll mostly deliver food from restaurants, but in some areas, you may deliver items from convenience stores.

Dashers must be at least 18 years old and pass a background check. Fortunately, DoorDash isn’t specific about your vehicle as long as it’s reliable. In some areas, you can even ride a bike or scooter to deliver for DoorDash.

DoorDash typically pays weekly, but you can request Fast Pay once per day. It costs $1.99 per transfer. DoorDash also offers DasherDirect, a prepaid Visa, that Dashers can receive immediate (and free) direct deposits after each delivery. There’s no credit check to get approved, but you must be an active Dasher. As a bonus, Dashers using DasherDirect automatically receive 2% cashback on gas at any gas station.

2. Complete Tasks on TaskRabbit

AVERAGE PAY: $19 – $30/hour

Taskers, as they call people who do side hustles on TaskRabbit, complete odd jobs for people. You advertise your services on TaskRabbit, and when people hire you, TaskRabbit handles all administrative work, including payments. TaskRabbit keeps a small portion of your earnings, but you leverage their large audience and can charge what you think is fair for the job.

Common tasks on TaskRabbit include home repairs, furniture assembly, moving, home cleaning, and personal assistant tasks.

TaskRabbit typically pays within 24 hours of receiving payment for a job you completed. While they pay daily for side hustles, the money can take up to five days to reach your bank account.

3. Take Online Surveys

AVERAGE PAY: $1 – $20 per survey (varies)

Taking online surveys is one of the most entertaining side hustles that pay daily. What other side hustle would pay you to give your opinion?

However, that doesn’t mean this side hustle doesn’t require work. To qualify for online surveys, you must pass screeners, which are questions you answer to determine if you meet the demographic needs of the survey. You may take a handful of screeners before qualifying, but you’ll get paid for providing your opinion when you qualify.

Popular online surveys include Survey Junkie, Swagbucks, and Branded Surveys.

When taking online surveys, read the fine print. Some companies have minimum thresholds you must reach before you cash out, so while you get paid daily for your surveys, receiving the funds may take a while.

4. Get Paid to Shop With Shipt

AVERAGE PAY: $20/hour

Shipt shoppers grocery shop for customers. It’s a fun side hustle that pays daily while also providing the opportunity to get out of the house.

Shoppers work through the Shipt app to accept customer orders. When you accept an order, you go to the grocery store the customer shopped at online and shop the order. After checking out (with a prepaid card), you deliver the groceries to the customer’s doorstep.

Shipt pays shoppers a flat fee for each order, plus you keep any tips the customer pays. Shoppers can request payouts daily, but only once per day and for a small fee. Otherwise, you can wait for the weekly direct deposit on Fridays for no charge.

AVERAGE PAY: $19.27/hour

The good news is if you’re an approved Uber driver, you’re automatically approved to drive for Uber Eats. This allows you more opportunities to earn cash daily. You can work the other to pick up the slack when one service is slow.

To be an Uber driver, you need a reliable car, proper car insurance, a background check, and, of course, you must have a valid driver’s license.

Uber offers the opportunity to collect pay instantly through Instant Pay. You can request payment up to six times daily for $0.85 per transfer, sending the funds to a debit card.

You may be tasked with taking pictures, purchasing a product (with reimbursement), or reporting back on the store’s cleanliness.

To be good at secret shopping, you must be able to notice small details, have good time management skills, and provide well-written responses about what you discovered while on the task.

If you tutor in person, you get paid on the spot and have cash daily. But if you tutor for a company online, you must follow their pay structure, which may mean receiving direct deposits weekly unless they offer instant pay options.

Landscaping is a fun side hustle that pays daily. If you love being outdoors and are great at caring for lawns and landscaping, you can make good money helping people in your area.

If you advertise your services yourself, request payment upfront or at least a deposit to get paid immediately, and then again when you complete the task.

AVERAGE PAY: $50 – $75 per appointment

Donating plasma is a great way to earn daily but without much work. You’re also helping people in need. Plasma helps trauma patients and people with certain diseases, so your side hustle also helps people who need you.

Each subsequent time, they’ll run quick medical tests, including taking your temperature and pulse to ensure your vitals are within the acceptable range to donate.

Most plasma donation centers pay you immediately for your donation on a prepaid debit card that you can use anywhere a Visa or Mastercard is accepted.

The nice thing about serving in restaurants is you earn an hourly wage plus customer tips, which you get immediately if they are cash. If your customers pay with a credit or debit card, you typically get your tips at the end of the night when you close your sales.

11. Provide Moving Services

First, you choose when and where you work and decide how much you’ll charge, which is great when looking for side hustles that pay daily.

Advertise your services with flyers and on your social media pages to let the local area know what you do. You can also use sites like Neighbor or TaskRabbit to get more business.

14. Create an Online Course

AVERAGE PAY: $1,000 – $10,000/year

Creating an online course is a great side hustle because you do the work once and then can sell the course as many times as people will buy it.

You don’t have to be certified to teach an online course. All you need is the passion and knowledge to effectively teach a subject and a platform to do it. Teachable and Udemy are two popular user-friendly platforms with a large audience to sell your courses.

15. Become a Freelance Writer

AVERAGE PAY: $2,500 – $4,000/month

Pet sitting, dog walking, and waste removal are all great side hustle pet services you can offer to get paid daily. Pet owners often need outside help caring for their pets while they are away or even daily walking services while they are at work.

Sites like Rover and Wag make it easy for pet sitters and dog walkers to advertise their services. You pay a small fee in exchange for using their site; however, they have large audiences, making it easier to find daily work.

18. Start a Consulting Business

AVERAGE PAY: $35 – $50/hour

If you specialize in a specific industry, you can offer consulting services outside your standard work hours. The nice thing about consulting is that you choose which projects you’ll handle, how much you’ll charge, and the turnaround time.

19. Flip Items

20. Provide Snow Removal Services

FAQs

Finding the right side hustle can be challenging. Here are some of the most frequent questions people have about daily paid side hustles.

Do All Gig Economy Jobs Offer Daily Payouts?

Not all gig economy jobs offer daily payouts. Read the fine print to see if they do and what they charge. Most daily payouts aren’t free, with a few exceptions, like DoorDash, so be sure you know what it will cost to ensure it’s worth it.

Can I Do Multiple Side Hustles That Pay Daily Simultaneously?

You can do as many side hustles as you can handle – there’s no limit. However, only take on what you can handle and provide great customer service. Many of the side hustles that pay daily rely on tips. The better service you provide, the more money you’ll earn.

Can I Make a Sustainable Income With Daily Paying Side Hustles?

Daily side hustles can pay well if you diversify your efforts and frequently work them. However, if you only work them in your free time, consider the funds supplemental income instead of adequate enough to cover the bills.

How Can I Manage My Finances Effectively With Daily Payouts?

Tracking your earnings is important because you must report them on your tax returns. Use automated software like Quickbooks to ensure you have an adequate record of your income and expenses.

How Can I Market My Services for Side Hustles That Pay Daily?

You can use many websites like Fiverr, Upwork, and TaskRabbit to advertise your side hustles. However, you can also advertise yourself using your social media pages or old-fashioned flyers in the neighborhood.

How Do Taxes Work for Daily Paying Side Hustles?

Like regular income, you must report your side hustle income. Since you won’t receive a W-2 as an independent contractor, you must report the income on Schedule C of your 1040.
